评论详情: The dress is really comfy and nice.... Just be sure to wear platform heels or try to find a petite size if you're on the "average" to short side. I collected leaves and gravel all night while trick or treating... but I love the dress

Ordered this a Halloween costume! Happy I did. This dress is a better quality than expected, you could honestly wear it again. I ordered a small and it fit the way I needed to. The dress was not super tight, the material is soft and it worked well for my costume. It is a bit long, so plan accordingly. At one point I did tie it up as I was walking. Overall, great dress for a costume!

This dress is great!  Fits well, appears to be a very good quality (not cheap like something from a Halloween costume store), and it looks perfect on me.  It says "tight fitting" but it's not tight on me. This will be comfortable to wear for the next costume party!  I'm very pleased with this purchase.  I also machine washed & dried it & it came out perfectly!
Loved this dress, the sleeves especially. And it fit well! Which is always a struggle for me.
unfortunately this was toooo stretchy and big- had to return it and find another idea
Y’all PLEASE???? I did NOT expect this dress to be so COMFY or FLATTERING. I’m obsessed, so excited to wear this!
It has a huge hole, the material is SUPER cheap thin and doesn’t fit well at all. Extremely dissatisfied with this purchase.
Super stoked about homing this year great fit awesome length
The material is so thin that it’s sheer and the neckline is completely different. I’m very unhappy with my purchase.

I ordered the XL in this. The neckline is absolutely nothing like the picture. And the sleeves were very long so I ordered a L to see if it fit better. The L dress is exactly like the picture with the right neckline and it’s a far better material - thicker and heavier. So I thought maybe they sent the wrong dress the first time. I ordered another XL (I still have the first XL so I know they didn’t send that one again) and again, it is not the same pictured dress. There is no shape to the neckline and the material is thinner and lighter. Why would different sizes be completely different dresses?

Due to my bust size, I can be a small or medium in dresses. I bought a medium based on the size chart but it was too big. I returned it and ordered a small, which fit perfectly! If you’re in between sizes like I am, I’d reocmmend sizing down. The fabric feels higher in quality than other Morticia-style dresses I ordered.
My daughter wore this for her Prom she loved it it was true to size well made
Comfortable and fit nice. Great material. Very pleased.

it’s okay honestly, it fit perfectly fine however i don’t feel it looked entirely like the photo. was also kinda short (i’m 5’4 for reference) and fell to about the bottom of my ankles unlike covering everything like it does in the picture.
Good material and can be used on different occasions, not only for Halloween.

评论概述: Low cost, simple dress that WORKS!
评论详情: I officiated my best friend's Halloween-themed wedding in this dress. I wanted a "Morticia Adams" look, and this was one of the few dresses that shipped locally and fast! (Order hack: Check the estimated delivery date!!) It is a simple dress, multi-blend synthetic fabric. Single layer. I was slightly underwhelmed by how simple it was, so I styled it up a bit with an underbust corsette, brooch, mini top hat, and designer heels. The material is very stretchy, so it hugs my curves nicely with room to breathe. Pro: There is a short train too, which was dramatic, but didn't get in the way. Con: The scalloped neckline didnt stay in place because the single layer of fabric was so thin. You could probably solve that with double sided fabric tape though. Next year, I'll probably wear this dress with a witch's hat for Halloween.
This dress is incredibly soft and comfortable. Has the perfect amount of stretch, isn't too thick, and looks so, so pretty. Very pleased

Cheap fabric. Poor fitting. I really wanted this costume to work as my daughters Halloween costume was Wednedy Adams. Didn’t work for me, so I returned it.  I will say that the costume did ship quickly and the return process was simple. So I’m grateful for that. 🖤

Yes my boobs are small but the neck line isn't designed very well. I dare say even a chick with big boobs it wouldn't fall on her chest properly. However it was a good price for the material. It even has a train! The lining is a lil itchy ans uncomfortable but perfect for Halloween.
For the price it was actually much better me than I thought it would be is very pleased. I was afraid it was gonna run small so I ordered a medium should’ve ordered a small but I made it work.
I was happy with this dress. I’m normally a medium but medium wasn’t available in time so I went with large. It wasn’t as fitted as I would have liked but still looked fine. Nice material.

Going to start with the quality of the dress is very good my only complaint is it fits bigger than expected. I ordered a medium and I’m 5’5 and 158 lbs. This dress swallowed me to the point that I had to stuff my bra lol. I wish the cut was lower in the front. Overall it did the job.
it’s pretty thick, it’s stretchy but i would recommend sizing down bc i’m usually a medium but i ordered a small and it fits perfectly. it’s also really comfortable. im obsessed with this dress😍.
My daughter loved the fit and the fabric
Dress was beautiful! I ordered a size up from my normal and wish I had ordered up two sizes! It’s very snug so if you want to hide anything go up another size.
The fit is great and the costume is flattering

I am 4’11” tall 105lbs. I normally wear a women’s XS but decided to order this in a size S.  It is super comfortable and very stretchy. The quality of the material is VERY good, nice and thick, not cheap. For being a petite woman, I was very surprised that the arms fit me perfectly and the length only needed to be slightly hemmed so that I could wear flat shoes. If I wore heels, this would be a perfect fit.
This dress was perfect up to the bust, where it was very loose and didn’t sit right.

So I have to say I am partly disappointed in this dress but I'm keeping it and fixing what I hate about it.  I'm 5' 6 1/2" tall and the dress doesn't even come to the top of my feet, the train is great though.  The neck line comes up closer to my collar bone rather then my bust line and it's made for people who's boobs are under their cos lol,  but I went off mostly that first picture then a few over that shows more of what the dress looks like so that was my fault.  The material is very nice and I do love the sleeves and the train. My biggest areas I hate is the neck line, the high chest area,  and the length of the front of the dress.  I'll post the pictures to show you what one I thought I was getting when I ordered it and the one the dress really looks like.

I would size down , I’m 5’2 & 134 lbs usually am a medium or size 6 but this outfit it SUPER stretchy because you have to be able to step into it since there’s no zipper. Nice thick material, and very long for my height

The dress is very flattering on my body and the quality is great. I returned bc it goes up really high on the chest. My boyfriend described it as a halloween dress I'd go to church in. It's very modest which some ppl want but I wanted some cleavage. I have DDD so almost everything I wear I have cleavage, so that's saying something about this dress lol
Good quality. Fits a little big on the top so I ordered a size down. comfortable.

The cut of this dress is incredibly flattering! The fabric is stretchy and substantial (great for us girlies with bigger hips / butts but smaller waists). Bought for a Halloween costume, but will be wearing this year round! IT FITS THAT WELL. My measurements are 38-30-42.

评论概述: Great quality and true to fit
评论详情: Fits great and good material.  I was concerned would be thin and see through but it’s not.
Perfect Halloween costume for Morticia Addams.  It runs small, so size up.  But it’s a great price for the quality, has good stretch, and is very comfortable.
The fabric is a nice, thick quality, and it fits quite well, but doesn’t touch the ground at the front if you are average/tall or want to wear heels. Other than that great costume for the price!
Excellent quality. Made well. Not cheap or flimsy. Great dress, can’t wait for Halloween to wear it!!

Halloween is a big deal in our household and every year we dress up in at least two different costumes.  I bought this to add to our costume collection.  This costume fits as expected and it is made of really nice material.  The quality is really good.
Tissu opaque de qualité. Grandeur parfaite!
Si era lo que había solicitado
